rows.label: tlk42360112_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Friends must have taken great pain
to come all way here.

rows.label: tlk42360112_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Lomlom tell you interesting story as
little reward for friends' effort.

rows.label: tlk42360112_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Drivers should be training day
and night in order to bond with
best Blades.

rows.label: tlk42360112_04_msg0005
rows.name:
But at actual time of bonding,
strongest part of heart is really
only thing that matter!

rows.label: tlk42360112_04_msg0006
rows.name:
To give example, for person with much
bravery, bond with blade determined
only by bravery.

rows.label: tlk42360112_04_msg0007
rows.name:
Other three attributes not even
important!

rows.label: tlk42360112_04_msg0008
rows.name:
Finally, Lomlom able to explain that
in way that makes sense!
